original_text: And when the voice was past, Jesus was found alone. And they kept it close, and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen.
korean_text: 소리가 그치매 오직 예수만 보이더라 제자들이 잠잠하여 그 본 것을 무엇이든지 그 때에는 아무에게도 이르지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: And when the voice was past

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 이 일을 마음속에 간직하며

sentences.original_text: and told no man in those days
any of those things which they had seen
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 보았던 그것들 중 어떤 것도
